serious_gym_seeker.name: Arjun Patel
serious_gym_seeker.background: Software engineer in Bangalore looking for serious fitness commitment
serious_gym_seeker.fitness_goal: Build strength and muscle mass with structured training
serious_gym_seeker.communication_style: Direct, focused, asks detailed questions about facilities
serious_gym_seeker.initial_query: I'm looking for a gym with proper weightlifting equipment and squat racks.
potential_follow_ups: Ask about peak hours and equipment availability.
Ask about personal trainer credentials.
Ask about membership plans and pricing.
Express interest in signing up if facilities meet requirements.
serious_gym_seeker.scenario_description: Serious Gym Seeker - Potential lead with specific fitness goals

chatty_socializer.name: Riya Kapoor
chatty_socializer.background: Marketing executive in Mumbai who loves to chat and make friends
chatty_socializer.fitness_goal: Social fitness, meeting new people while staying active
chatty_socializer.communication_style: Very talkative, goes off-topic frequently, asks about everything
chatty_socializer.initial_query: Hi! I saw your gym online. Do you have good music? I love working out to Bollywood songs!
potential_follow_ups: Share stories about previous gym experiences.
Ask about the social scene and making friends.
Discuss favorite workout music and ask about sound system.
Talk about weekend plans and social activities.
Ask random questions about staff, decor, and atmosphere.
chatty_socializer.scenario_description: Chatty Socializer - Uses chatbot to socialize and talk about various topics

philosophical_questioner.name: Vikram Singh
philosophical_questioner.background: Philosophy professor in Delhi who questions everything and loves deep conversations
philosophical_questioner.communication_style: Intellectual, asks existential questions, goes into philosophical tangents
philosophical_questioner.initial_query: What is the true purpose of physical fitness in the modern human experience?
potential_follow_ups: Discuss the philosophy of mind-body connection.
Ask about the gym's approach to holistic wellness.
Question the commercialization of fitness.
Talk about ancient Indian fitness practices vs modern methods.
Ask if the gym promotes mindful exercise.
philosophical_questioner.scenario_description: Philosophical Questioner - Tests chatbot's ability to handle abstract conversations

tech_troubleshooter.name: Aditi Sharma
tech_troubleshooter.background: IT support specialist in Pune who tests systems and finds bugs
tech_troubleshooter.fitness_goal: Stay fit while working long hours in tech
tech_troubleshooter.communication_style: Analytical, tries to break the chatbot, asks edge case questions
tech_troubleshooter.initial_query: What happens if I type really long messages like this one that goes on and on and on and has no real point but I want to see how you handle it?
potential_follow_ups: Send messages with special characters: @#$%^&*().
Ask the same question multiple times in different ways.
Try to get the chatbot to contradict itself.
Ask impossible questions like 'What's the weight of your thoughts?'.
Test the chatbot's memory by referencing things from 10 messages ago.
tech_troubleshooter.scenario_description: Tech Troubleshooter - Tests chatbot limits and edge cases

lonely_senior.name: Rajesh Uncle
lonely_senior.background: Retired bank manager in Kolkata who lives alone and craves conversation
lonely_senior.fitness_goal: Stay active and have someone to talk to
lonely_senior.communication_style: Lonely, shares personal stories, talks about family and past
lonely_senior.initial_query: Beta, I'm feeling very lonely these days. My children are busy. Do you have time to chat?
potential_follow_ups: Share stories about his grandchildren and family.
Talk about his health concerns and doctor visits.
Discuss his late wife and memories.
Ask about the chatbot's 'family' and personal life.
Share opinions about today's youth and changing times.
lonely_senior.scenario_description: Lonely Senior - Uses chatbot for companionship and emotional support

conspiracy_theorist.name: Rohit Mishra
conspiracy_theorist.background: Freelance journalist in Lucknow who questions everything and believes in conspiracies
conspiracy_theorist.fitness_goal: Expose the truth about the fitness industry
conspiracy_theorist.communication_style: Suspicious, asks probing questions, brings up conspiracy theories
conspiracy_theorist.initial_query: Are you recording this conversation? Who has access to my data?
potential_follow_ups: Ask about data privacy and surveillance.
Question the gym's corporate affiliations.
Discuss fitness industry conspiracies.
Ask about hidden cameras and monitoring.
Talk about government health policies and control.
conspiracy_theorist.scenario_description: Conspiracy Theorist - Tests chatbot's handling of suspicious and paranoid users

meme_lord_teenager.name: Aarav Gupta
meme_lord_teenager.background: High school student in Gurgaon who communicates primarily through memes and slang
meme_lord_teenager.communication_style: Uses Gen Z slang, memes, abbreviations, and internet language
meme_lord_teenager.initial_query: yo this gym looks mid ngl ðŸ’€ do u even lift bro? fr fr no cap
potential_follow_ups: Use heavy internet slang and abbreviations.
Ask about Instagram-worthy spots in the gym.
Reference popular memes and trends.
Use terms like 'sus', 'slay', 'periodt', 'no cap', 'bussin'.
Ask if the gym is 'aesthetic' enough for social media.
meme_lord_teenager.scenario_description: Meme Lord Teenager - Tests chatbot's ability to understand modern slang and youth culture

medical_anxiety_person.name: Kavya Iyer
medical_anxiety_person.background: Accountant in Chennai with health anxiety and multiple medical concerns
medical_anxiety_person.fitness_goal: Exercise safely without triggering health issues
medical_anxiety_person.communication_style: Anxious, asks many health-related questions, very cautious
medical_anxiety_person.initial_query: I have diabetes, high blood pressure, and knee problems. Is it safe for me to exercise?
potential_follow_ups: Ask about medical clearance requirements.
Discuss various health conditions and exercise restrictions.
Ask about emergency procedures and first aid.
Want to know about insurance and liability.
Ask about specific exercises for medical conditions.
medical_anxiety_person.scenario_description: Medical Anxiety Person - Tests chatbot's handling of health-related queries and boundaries

price_haggler.name: Suresh Agarwal
price_haggler.background: Business owner in Jaipur who loves to negotiate and find the best deals
price_haggler.fitness_goal: Get fit while spending the least amount of money
price_haggler.communication_style: Persistent negotiator, asks for discounts, compares prices constantly
price_haggler.initial_query: What's your best price? I can get membership at Gold's Gym for â‚¹500 less.
potential_follow_ups: Ask for discounts, offers, and deals.
Compare prices with other gyms.
Ask about free trials and money-back guarantees.
Try to negotiate custom packages.
Ask about referral bonuses and loyalty programs.
price_haggler.scenario_description: Price Haggler - Tests chatbot's ability to handle price negotiations and comparisons

random_topic_jumper.name: Neha Jain
random_topic_jumper.background: Graphic designer in Ahmedabad with ADHD who jumps between topics constantly
random_topic_jumper.fitness_goal: Stay focused and improve concentration through exercise
random_topic_jumper.communication_style: Scattered, changes topics mid-conversation, asks unrelated questions
random_topic_jumper.initial_query: Do you have treadmills? Oh wait, do you know where I can get good samosas nearby?
potential_follow_ups: Jump from gym questions to food recommendations.
Ask about completely unrelated topics like weather or movies.
Start talking about pets, family, or work suddenly.
Ask about local attractions and places to visit.
Discuss current events or social media trends randomly.
random_topic_jumper.scenario_description: Random Topic Jumper - Tests chatbot's ability to handle scattered conversations and topic changes

metadata.purpose: Diverse chatbot interaction testing for Anytime Fitness AI Agent
